subsection.subsectiontext: A person referred to in section 1 is, subject to subsections (2) and (3), entitled to be reimbursed for necessary and reasonable travelling, lodging and other expenses incurred by the person as a result of sitting as a juror.

The expenses to which a person is entitled under subsection (1) must be ascertained and approved by the sheriff who may, for that purpose, require the person to provide a declaration as to those expenses.
A person who makes a false declaration to the sheriff under subsection (2) respecting the person's expenses

paragraph.paragraphtext: is not entitled to receive any payment under this regulation, and
is subject to any other penalty to which the person may be subject as a result of the making of the false declaration.
